ruleset.name: Code Style
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce a specific coding style.

rule.name: UseConcatOnce
rule.message: The xpath concat() function accepts as many arguments as required, you may be able to factorize this expression
rule.description: The XPath concat() functions accepts as many arguments as required so you can have "concat($a,'b',$c)" rather than "concat($a,concat('b',$c)".
rule.example: <xsl:variable name="var" select="concat("Welcome",concat("to you ",$name))"/> <xsl:variable name="var" select="concat("Welcome","to you ",$name))">
